ygData.subject: Re: Targetting Mobs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A lot of people I know had it mapped to the ` key back in beta. This is a great place for it because it s a rarely used key and right beside all the rest
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Sep 15/99, kim@... wrote:
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Wed, 15 Sep 1999, JasonF wrote:
> >
> > Now, with that said, I'm coming to regret my decision to
> > map the most commonly used letter in the English alphabet
> > (E) to be my attack key. I have to be extremely cautious
> > when conversing with NPCs that I have the text entry
> > window up before blasting out a string of text. Many
>
> I remapped mine to caps lock. Aside from EQ, I don't think I
> ever use that key.

A lot of people I know had it mapped to the ` key back in beta. This is
a great place for it because it's a rarely used key and right beside all
the rest of your hotkeys. It was screwed up for a while due to Verant's
arbitrary mapping of the transparency toggle to it but they recently
allowed that to be remapped so you can use it again. Of course I use the
wasd keys for movement so this is even more convenient. Because I was
used to UO where talking didnt require hitting return, the first thing I
did in EQ was move every configurable key off the letter keys. After
attacking a shopkeeper of course. :)


--
